benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/invoicePayments/{paymentId}/customFields - Add custom fields to payment

covered: Valid Payload and happy-path coverage: TC01, TC02, TC03, TC04, TC05, TC21 verify successful creation and response structure.
Header handling and authorization: tests cover required X-Killbill-CreatedBy and optional headers (TC02); missing header (TC09) and unauthorized access (TC12).
Input validation and error handling: tests for empty payload (TC07), malformed JSON (TC08), extra fields (TC06), missing required fields (TC16), SQL/XSS payloads (TC14).
PaymentId and parameter validation: tests for invalid paymentId format (TC10) and unsupported query parameters (TC17).
Existence and not-found cases: tests for non-existent payment (TC11).
Error and performance scenarios: tests for service unavailability (TC13), network timeout (TC18), and performance tests (TC22, TC23).
Data integrity and edge cases: tests for duplicate fields (TC20), Unicode handling (TC21), persistence/integration (TC24, TC25), and accessibility (TC26).
Boundary conditions: empty array handling (TC07) and large payload handling (TC15).
gaps: 500 Internal Server Error scenario (server/database failure) is not tested.
Caching behavior (ETag/Cache-Control) for POST responses is not tested.
403 Forbidden scenarios (permissions) are not separately tested beyond 401 Unauthorized.
More exhaustive data-type validations for CustomField properties are not present.
recommendations: Add tests for 500 Internal Server Error to cover server failures (DB outages).
Add 403 Forbidden tests to verify proper handling when permissions are insufficient.
Add rate-limiting/throttling tests for burst load handling.
Add caching behavior tests for POST responses if applicable (ETag/Cache-Control).
Add data-type validations for CustomField properties (fieldName/fieldValue types and lengths).
Add idempotency tests for repeated submissions to verify no unintended duplicates.
Add tests for additional header value edge-cases and validation.
